varying_rho module¶

Writes varying_rho output for given example to file.

varying_rho.varying_rho_demo(number, sentence, rho)¶

Draw chaining diagram using given Spreading Algorithm rho.

Parameters

  • number (str) – Example sentence identifier in example_dict

  • sentence (str) – Example sentence == example_dict[number]

  • rho (float) – In [0.0, 1.0] where 0.0 = not spread out, 1.0 = completely spread out, and any number in between = partially spread out

varying_rho.varying_rho_demo_write_number_sentence(number, sentence, rho)¶
Parameters

  • number (str) –

  • sentence (str) –

  • rho (float) –

varying_rho.varying_rho_doc(number='10.1', file='../docs/varying_rho', **kwargs)¶

Output file containing example sentence with varying rho.

Parameters

  • number (optional) – str in example_dict. Defaults to “10.1”.

  • file (str, optional) – File name. Defaults to “../docs/varying_rho”.

  • kwargs – other key-value arguments accepted by Manager.set_state

Returns

The full path to the generated file.

Return type

str
